turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there, what would you like to do today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I was thinking about getting pizza for dinner.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: pizza for dinner, what a good idea.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: where at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Bella Luna, sure.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How many pizza would you like to order today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think just two pizzas should do it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok sure 2 pizzas, what size will your pizza be?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: large.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what are your choice of toppings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: On one of them can I do spinach, and avocado, with red onion? And on the second one a meat lovers.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 1 with spanich, riccota with red onion and 1 meat lover is that right.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: a spinach ricotta cheese and red onion.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok spanich, ricotta cheese and red onion.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: any other special instruction?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: thick crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: all comes with thick crust is that what you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, let me get your totals for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok your total comes to to 48 dollars for your 2 large pizzas, shall we go ahead and order them?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. Could you confirm the pizzas for me one more time, though?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure i can do that.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sorry.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: bless you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so we have 2 large pizzas, 1 with spanich, ricotta cheese and red onion and 1 with meat lover is that correct.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok would you like anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's it. Thank you so much for your help.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you are welcome, enjoy your pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.
